virtual-sensor.name: Matterhorn_DozerDigitalDCX_hr_3933
virtual-sensor.description: Dozer messages (DozerDigitalDCXMsg) from Matterhorn deployment in human readable form

source.query: select TIMED, timestr(GEN_TIME) as generation_time, HEADER_SEQNR as sequence_number, HEADER_ORIGINATORID as node_id, to_tinyint(PAYLOAD_SAMPLENO >> 15) as valid, to_smallint(PAYLOAD_SAMPLENO & 32767) as sample_number, PAYLOAD_BATTERYSTATUS as battery_status, PAYLOAD_DCXDATA_STATUS0 as dcx_data_status_0, PAYLOAD_DCXDATA_STATUS1 as dcx_data_status_1, PAYLOAD_DCXDATA_STATUS2 as dcx_data_status_2, PAYLOAD_DCXDATA_STATUS3 as dcx_data_status_3, PAYLOAD_DCXDATA_FLOATARRAY0 as dcx_data_0, PAYLOAD_DCXDATA_FLOATARRAY1 as dcx_data_1, PAYLOAD_DCXDATA_FLOATARRAY2 as dcx_data_2, PAYLOAD_DCXDATA_FLOATARRAY3 as dcx_data_3 from wrapper
